title: Live Long and Smoke!
itunes:title: Live Long and Smoke!
description: Today on the Cigar Authority we have proof that Cigars are NOT harmful to you, and are actually good for you in moderation. Doctor and Scientist Mark MiCozzi shares his remarkable discovery for the first time ever on radio, and gives you all the details on the benefits of premium cigars. Plus, we have on Christian Eiroa, founder of the new CLE Cigar Company, to tell us about his new lineup of premium cigars; Cuarenta, Corojo and Wynwood. We also talk premium watches with the one and only "Vintage Watchman" from www.thevintagewatchman.com. It's an action packed show for the ages you don't want to miss!
